name: failure-to-land
description: Failure To Land (FTL): Job search optimization with validated learning

scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && (sed -i.bak -e 's/style\.css/style.min.css/g' -e 's/app\.js/app.min.js/g' dist/index.html && rm -f dist/index.html.bak) && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html
scripts.test: echo 'Testing with sample data' && npm run serve
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages

author: Job Search Optimizer Team
